content: उपेक्षा {@--1@} Overlooking, disregard, neglect. {@--2@} Indifference, contempt, disdain; कुर्यामुपेक्षां हतजीवितेऽस्मिन् <ls>R. 14. 65.</ls> {@--3@} Leaving, quitting. {@--4@} Endurance, patience. {@--5@} Dissent. {@--6@} Neglect, trick or deceit (one of the 7 expedients in war). {@--7@} A sort of भावना in Yoga, <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--8@} Regard, consideration.
